modName: Requiem - The Book of UUNP Patch
summary: This is a patch for The Book of UUNP Bodyslide and Requiem (old and new versions), with support for Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified and Crafting Overhaul Reqtified. Skimpy and "no skimpy" versions available.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=4]Version 1.2.2 is for REQUIEM 1.9.4[/size][/b]
[b][size=4]Version 2.0.1.1 is for REQUIEM 2.0.1
[b][size=4]The patch for REQUIEM 2.0.2 is planned
[/size][/b][/size][/b][/center]
[size=3][b]Requirements for version 2.0.1.1[/b][/size]
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75861]The Book of UUNP Bodyslide[/url]﻿ - version 1.67
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]﻿ - version 2.0.1
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch (USLEEP)[/url]﻿ - any version (the patch was made with version 3.0.13)
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61520]KFR - Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified[/url]﻿ - version 2.1b5
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61569]COR - Crafting Overhaul Reqtified[/url]﻿ - version 2.1b3
[/list]
[size=3][b]Requirements for version 1.2.2[/b][/size]
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75861]The Book of UUNP Bodyslide[/url]﻿ - version 1.67
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]﻿ - version 1.9.4.1
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch (USLEEP)[/url]﻿ - any version (the patch was made with version 3.0.13)
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61569]COR - Crafting Overhaul Reqtified[/url]﻿ - version 2.0.1b3
[/list]
Strongly suggested (not a hard requirement): [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61520]KFR - Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified[/url]﻿ - version 2.0.1b3

[i]Note:[/i] the last two requirements exist due to the reqtification of outfits and leveled lists records. If those records didn't exist in The Book of UUNP Bodyslide, the Crafting Overhaul Reqtified mod would still be strongly recommended but not a hard requirement, however in that case you would only find the armors in the crafting menu and not around Skyrim.

[b][size=3]Load order[/size][/b]
Load The Book of UUNP Bodyslide before Requiem, load this patch anywhere after Requiem and after KFR and COR:

Dawnguard DLC
Hearthfire DLC
Dragonborn DLC
Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch
[other mods]
The Book of UUNP Bodyslide
[other mods]
Requiem
[other Requiem mods]
KFR - Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified
COR - Crafting Overhaul Reqtified
[other Requiem mods]
Requiem - The Book of UUNP Bodyslide Patch (this patch)
[other Requiem mods]
Reqtificator patch (remember to run the Reqtificator after installing or updating this patch)

[i]Note:[/i] be careful with the load order of your Requiem patches, because, if you have another mod that edits the same outfits, containers or leveled lists, only the last loaded patch will show its changes in the game.

[b][size=3]Description of the patch
[/size][/b][size=3][i]TL;DR[/i]
[/size]The Book Of UUNP Bodyslide has been reqtified, its armors work as alternatives to vanilla armors, you'll find them on NPCs, for sale and in the crafting menu, if you have the books on you; there are two versions of the patch, one includes skimpy armors while the other one doesn't.

[size=3][i]Details[/i][/size]
Armors have been edited to have the same stats as vanilla armors, based on Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified﻿, regardless of what the assets' looks like: this is intentional, the purpose is to keep The Book of UUNP Bodyslide's concept of providing alternatives to vanilla armors.
Recipes have been reqtified, based on Crafting Overhaul Reqtified (same idea as armor stats), and support for Crafting Overhaul Reqtified has been implemented (including the specific/generic Fur Plates option).
Books have been reqtified by changing their text to be more immersive/lore-friendly (same idea as the Smithing books from Requiem).
Containers' edits were merged reasonably.
Leveled lists were deleveled and merged based on Requiem's design and on the edits to the outfits.
Outfits were patched to achieve a balance between presence of The Book of UUNP Bodyslide's assets and Requiem's design.
[i]Note:[/i] The three satchels behave like the Leather Bandolier, included in Complete Crafting Overhaul: the stats and the crafting requirements are the same and the enchantment is the same (it can be customized with the "large" option in Complete Crafting Overhaul's MCM). If you leave Bandoliers disabled in CCO's MCM, the satchels' enchantments still work, they keep the default value of +15 carry weight.

[size=3][i]Important[/i][/size]
The patch has two different versions, you can (obviously) use only one:
[list]
[*]skimpy: all The Book of UUNP Bodyslide content, the recipes for the skimpy outfits appear in the crafting menu only if you turn on the "Fantasy/Not lore-friendly" recipes option in the Crafting Overhaul Reqtified configuration menu (Complete Crafting Overhaul's MCM)
[*]no skimpy: to be used with the "No More Skimpy Outfits ESP" from The Book of UUNP Bodyslide
[/list]
[b][size=3]Bugs[/size][/b]
Both The Book of UUNP Bodyslide and Requiem are very big mods. I checked everything in the patch but you never know... This section is here for you to help me help you help me make this patch better.

Bugs that this patch CAN'T cause:
[list]
[*]visual bugs
[*]Bodyslide issues
[*]issues with world edits
[*]assets missing from The Book of UUNP Bodyslide mod's folders
[*]records missing from The Book of UUNP Bodyslide ESP
[*]issues with the installation of the required mods
[*]crashes (if the crashes are not caused by a required mod that is missing from your load order, then the crashes are not caused by this patch)
[/list]
Bugs that this patch COULD cause:
[list]
[*]issues with balance
[/list]Solution: tell me exactly what armor(s), NPC(s) or merchant(s) seem unbalanced and why, we'll discuss what's wrong[list]
[*]typos
[/list]Solution: tell me exactly where the typo is (what item), I'll fix it as soon as possible
[list]
[*]records that I forgot to reqtify (not deleveled leveled lists, merchants not having armors or books for sale, NPCs not wearing the correct armors, ...)
[/list]Solution: tell me exactly what record(s), I'll tell you if it actually is something I missed and, if so, I'll fix it as soon as possible[list]
[*]armors from other mods are missing from merchants' inventories or NPCs
[/list]Solution: check your load order, because, if you have another mod that edits the same outfits, leveled lists or containers as this patch, only the ESP that is loaded last will show its edits in your game
[list]
[*]crashes
[/list]Solution: you forgot to load a mod that is required by this patch, please check the Requirements section of this description and your load order

[b][size=3]Credits and thanks[/size][/b]
Thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7388094]thetrader[/url]﻿ for checking this patch and offering helpful tips and for providing the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61621]Requiem Patch Central[/url]﻿'s patches, an excellent example of how to make Requiem patches
Credit and thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977]gamefever[/url]﻿ for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75861]The Book of UUNP Bodyslide[/url]﻿
Credit and thanks to the Requiem team for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]﻿
Credit and thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8411732]UnmeiX[/url] for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61520]KFR - Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified[/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61569]COR - Crafting Overhaul Reqtified[/url]
Credit and thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/684492]Arthmoor[/url]﻿ for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url]
